(i) a systematized review of the most recent 
evidence on maternal nutrition, the prevention of obesity and noncommunicable diseases; (ii) a review of 
existing national recommendations for nutrition, physical activity and weight gain during pregnancy in Member 
States of the WHO European Region; and (iii) possible opportunities for actions at national levels on how 
to promote nutrition and diet-related health throughout the life-course, ensure optimal fetal development
